# Cloud Platform

:::{admonition} In Progress
:class: margin
<br>
:::

The team will depend on cloud platforms for secure [efficient](https://dictionary.cambridge.org/us/dictionary/english/efficient) operations vis-Ã -vis:

* Conducting proof of concept data modelling projects.
* Storing and cataloguing data sets.
